content.label: I have beat the game before I resetted my iPad, and I’m back to beat it again!

title.label: Awesome game, Awesome Music, HARD Difficulty...

content.label:
I LOVE this game! Get the game, it will mean a lot to the people who made this game, Overall, Amazing App! Also hard difficulty...
BEWARE!

Had this game since 2012 and it’s nice to see that its gotten support for new devices ever since. I really recommend this game if you like to be challenged, and if you want to work on your reflexes and ability to concentrate. One minor complaint is that depending on your sound output, the second stage can have some distorted bass at a certain point.
What happened? Wanted to play the game again after a few years, but theres no sound

Simple to pick up and learn, but my god is this game hard. It’s really hard to keep your bearings on this sensory feast of a game, with the music blasting and the lights flashing and all. Just keep at it, you’ll get there soon enough.
Bought on android and wanted to play here too, but there’s no sound.
I really like this game but I think it would be cool if you made it’s so we can play third Version of each levels
I own this on everything I can have it on great game for burning time while doing something else

This game is objectively perfect. I’m not saying this is the best, or even my favorite game, but for what this game needs to do, it excels masterfully in every way it needs to, and is therefore perfect.

1. No ads, you get right back in. This app isn't freemium like the other 99% of games are, so once you die, all you have to do is tap the screen. This is also what makes the game not frusturating in the slightest.

2. ACTUALLY FUN, AND ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY. Thats a breakthrough isn’t it? Good gameplay on a mobile game? I wish I wasn't being sarcastic. :(

This the perfect game. Its 150% worth the money, buy it now.
Amazing game with infinite replay ability. the only flaw is that sometimes the high score does not get updated in the menu.

Total waste. The easiest setting is called “HARD,” and it is. I’ve never lasted more than 5 seconds - literally. The absence of any mode that allows you to learn and improve makes this app a TOTAL FAILURE. Money back, please.   This isn’t worth $3; it isn’t worth 3 cents.
I finished hexagonest hyper mode and got a score of 65:01 sec and then I returned hours later and it says 60:01 secs like wth dude that took so much time

For once, not a rip-off. I am struggling on hexagoner because of the fast move to this that this that rotation, it’s HARD. But to be honest I don’t know why hyper hexagonest is easy... Anyways this game, Is Hexagon out of Hexagon. *Yes I HAD to make a pun.

I’m completely confused by the 5 star ratings. Unfun, overly simple, and way too sensitive to exact timing. The music is good. Not worth $3, not even close.
Its ok but definitely not worth spending money on
This game is completely fun and addictive in my opinion. I play this game everyday. It’s really fun to play, even though I already beat the game, I still enjoy playing it.
This is one of the few modern app stores games that isn’t filled with micro transactions or junk. Just pure skill and a unique concept.
I Beat Each Level!!! In 1 Session!!! The 1st Time I Beat A Level Was Hexagoner. But Can You Nerf The Hyper Mode Levels?
Disappointed to find the sound doesn’t work, will be requesting a refund
Mind blowing game :P

title.label: Not running at 120hz on the 3rd gen iPad Pro

content.label: Srssly, this may be the best arcade game of all time. It's the pure distilled essence of the arcade, presented in wild modern glory.

And Hardestestester. Mastered the toughest level long agon and wishing I still had a challenge or two. 

Game is remarkable, just needs some harder levels. New players need not worry by this review. It'll take you a whole lot of time and effort to master every level as it is now.
i’ve never felt such hatred towards the number 59 in my life

The game is fun as hell and probably one of the only mobile games that I do not regret buying however the music isn’t for me and I know that the music itself is a key element in the game but I would like to have chill session sometimes and be able to listen to my own music. And being able to link with steam would be nice.

title.label: I loved it but i almost finished The very last level

content.label: Super hexagon is one of the most challenging game ive ever played it requires ur quick brain in order to think how to dodge that wall for me the more u play it the more u get improved when i was grade 4 i almost finished it like 52 secs

I cannot change control settings, the way they have optimized this game on mobile device is so moronic . They could have added round shape controller or at least make this thing go towards where you have pressed, because it is SO slow it made me freaking mad!

This game is the definition of challenging! The controls are simple and very responsive! The music if probably one of if not the best part of this. The gameplay is excruciatingly difficult (what do you expect?) Overall an amazing classic iOS game!! Good job Terry!

I absolutely love this game.  The controls are great, it’s very challenging, and beating your high score is ridiculously satisfying.  However, i got 46 seconds, and it says my best time is 22.  i keep beating my high score, but it never saves, which frustrates me.  please fix this and i would change to 5 stars

title.label: To all the one star ratings

content.label: Most of the low star ratings say that the games controls are bad, the game over voice is annoying, or it’s too hard. I really like the controls, but it gets a while to get used to. A part of the challenge is always knowing where the pointer is, and inverting your brain to adapt when the pointer switches sides. The ladies voice also isn’t annoying, and shouldn’t hold you back from getting the game. I feel like I don’t even hear the voice of the game over scene, because I restart the game so quickly and get absorbed once again. And for those who think the game is too hard, that’s kind of the point. The game seems really fast, confusing, and unintuitive, but the point is to adapt to it. There really are no other games like this one. If you don’t like repetition and practice, the you probably won’t enjoy the game. Even then, I thought I didn’t like that either but I beat every difficulty on this. Don’t want to be the guy who says “get good,” but that’s the only fun you’ll have with this game.

Thank you for such a wonderful game. I bought this game 5 years ago and finally beat it today! 
I have never been into a game for so long. The final clip and the feels after finally beating this game are extremely satisfying!

Thanks again for always shining my days :).

title.label: Weird stuttering in 3.02 on iPhone 7 Plus

content.label:
This new GL renderer has been causing noticeable frame rate variation on my iPhone 7 Plus. Game itself is amazing but it’s really hard to play like this. 

I’ve tried killing all other open apps, rebooting phone entirely, and disabling the 120fps thing and it’s definitely not working for me. Sometimes it works fine, which I know because I can easily get over 60s but when it’s in stutter mode I have a hell of a time getting past 15-20s because your little character no longer moves at a constant rate so if you have a slow-down or speed-up while he’s moving he generally ends up going too far or not far enough before you can adjust. 😿
Thank you for fixing the screen size problem!! You guys are the best!

title.label: The best 3 dollars you could spend on the store

content.label: This game is incredibly fun addicting and exciting. Has an incredible soundtrack that I’ve listened to on my own time. Tons of levels. Doesn’t have any annoying ads. One of the very few cases I would EVER buy a game on the store and this is one of those cases
Please fix the screen issue with iPhone 7. Other than that, this game is awesome. 5-stars
Yes, it’s updated for the iPhone X. But, the input lag is unbearable compared to the PC version.

Part of the reason i bought this game was the music and it doesn't work!! Please fix this. I paid for the game and enjoy it but without the music its not the same. I played on a friends phone and enjoyed it but this isn't right

Thanks

title.label: Full screen fixed in latest support

content.label: Thanks a lot guys!
Was not with $3 is extremely boring
Not much about the game. It’s always been great! This review is just to appreciate the dev updating the game to 3.0 after so long. Absolutely amazing and truly appreciate it.

title.label: Still one of the best mobile games ever

content.label: Super Hexagon is one of those genuine classics that has emerged from the mobile gaming era, and its stellar post-launch support elevates it even above abandoned once-greats like Drop7 to keep it a perennial favorite on my phone.
Thank you so much for updating this game for the iPhone X and 120fps support. I have been waiting for this for a long time.

title.label: Make it fit to iPhone X!

content.label: I’m dying because the game screen does not extend to where my hands naturally rest on the X. I can totally make my hexagons more super if it were to render/fit to the X!
This game is great and I recommend buying. However this is kinda a game where it’s hard to sit down and play it for 20 minutes. Although it is still very addicting and fun

Worth the money. Totally amazing. Oh my gosh this is the most amazing game. Best challenger and very addictive. I can’t recommend this enough. This game is so much fun!! Totally worth the buy. Please buy. You won’t regret it. Awesome music and awesome everything. 😆😆😎😎

Only thing that would make it better is if the levels were called Point, Line, Triangle, Square, Pentagon, and Hexagon instead of Hexagon, Hexagoner, and Hexagonest, and then just the same name but with Hyper in front of it.

One of the most fun & replayable games I’ve ever played! Can we please get a full-width update for iPhone X though to eliminate the dead zones on the edges of the screen? Even just enabling touch w/o widening the field of view would go a long way!
